title: Havens-Hasty: Prospects Are Good For WhiteWave-Danone (Audio)

description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Nancy Havens-Hasty, President and CIO for Havens Advisors, on Danone’s $10 billion takeover of WhiteWave Foods Co.
